pageContext.claim: “By the way, I hate to say this, they're doing $750 million in Florida -- but we won't mention that tonight. They'll be doing it here soon, too, because they love this state. Charter Steel announced a new $150 million steel mill in Cuyahoga Heights; that's a great one. JSW Steel is restarting the furnace and investing $500 million in Mingo Junction. Lot of jobs. And Cleveland-Cliffs announced a brand new, beautiful $700 million plant in Toledo. And that's just a few of them. That's just a few of them.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is taking credit where none is due. Charter Steel's announcement came in early 2017 and Cleveland-Cliffs announced their new plant in June 2017. Both announcement were well before Trump's tariffs.
